tutorialPages.messageText: NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "F895A70945064B199FE52AB957A7C4E1", "Congratulations on becoming a citizen! Citizens gain benefits like discounts, buffs, and exclusive rewards.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "96194EC840CB1307310446A16581E1AC", "To fund those benefits, citizens pay taxes in the form of Tax Certificates. These are earned by doing actions that benefit the node.")

NSLOCTEXT("[D20C99C24B2FABB4DC05E3BF1EE067C5]", "D4EB11EA47047D6521DC9885834C7500", "Commissions, buy orders, and voting in mayoral elections are just a few of the ways you can contribute to a node. Get out there and do your part!")
